price: Kugira ntimwiyegereze mu vyo mukora vyose munasenga, kiretse Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, mutayibangikanya. Mu vy’ukuri, jewe Muhamadi ndi Umugabisha gusa ku bihano vyayo, nkongera nkashikiriza inkuru ihumuriza abemeramana ku ndishi zayo;
arabic: أَلَّا تَعۡبُدُوٓاْ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَۚ إِنَّنِي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ وَبَشِيرٞ

meta.transliteration: allā taʿbudū illā al-laha innanī lakum min'hu nadhīrun wabashīrun
translations: and a bearer of glad tidings
